local decayedDoors = {
    ['Plus'] = { position = { { -3.00, 1.52, 9.50 }, { 6.00, 1.52, 0.50 }, { 15.00, 1.52, 9.50 } }, GUID = {}, rotation = { { 0.00, 180.00, 0.00 }, { 0.00, 180.00, 0.00 }, { 0.00, 180.00, 0.00 } } },
}
local whitchHouse = { '2e0736' }
local unknownPlaces = {}
local outOfPlayPile = {
    ['encounterDeck'] = {
        position = { 30.50, 3.61, -3.00 } },
    ['unknownPlacesDeck'] = {
        position = { 35.00, 2.5, 2.50 } },
}

local act1bCard = {
    ['blackBook'] = { position = { 6.00, 1.92, -8.47 }, rotation = { 0, 180, 0 }, GUID = "6fc61c", },
    ['geometry'] = { position = { 30.50, 3.61, -3.00 }, rotation = { 0, 180, 180 }, GUID = "701ec5" },

}

local keziahRoom = { GUID = 'b4e961' }

local locationCards = { ['walterGillmansRoom'] = getObjectFromGUID('45b1c3'), ['hallway'] = getObjectFromGUID('ad5184') }

function onLoad()
    createButton()
    math.randomseed(os.time())
    self.shuffle()
    self.randomize()
    completeAllLocationsTable()
end

function createButton()
    self.createButton({
        label = "Mise en place",
        click_function = "setUp",
        function_owner = self,
        position = { 0, 0.3, 1.8 },
        rotation = { 0, 0, 0 },
        height = 350,
        width = 1800,
        font_size = 250,
        color = { 0, 0, 0 },
        font_color = { 1, 1, 1 },
        tooltip = "Mise en place"
    })
end

function setUp()
    local tab = decayedDoors['Plus']
    for i = 1, 3 do
        local row = {}
        row.GUID = tab.GUID[i]
        row.rotation = tab.rotation[i]
        row.position = tab.position[i]
        placeObj(row)
    end

    local unknownPlacesDeck = buildUnknownPlacesDeck(unknownPlaces, 3)
    local row = {}
    row.position = outOfPlayPile['unknownPlacesDeck'].position
    row.rotation = { 0.00, 180.00, 0 }
    for i, GUID in ipairs(unknownPlacesDeck) do
        Wait.frames(function()
            row.GUID = GUID
            placeObj(row)
            row.position[2] = row.position[2] + i / 10
        end, i)
    end
    Wait.time(function()
        local encounterDeck = getOutOfPlayPile('encounterDeck')
        encounterDeck.shuffle()
        local unknownPlacesDeckbuilt = getOutOfPlayPile('unknownPlacesDeck')
        unknownPlacesDeckbuilt.setName('Deck "Endroits Inconnus"')

        broadcastToAll('Mise en place terminée', { 0, 0.75, 0.75 })
    end, 3)
    self.editButton({
        position = { 0, 0.3, 1.8 },
        index = 0,
        label = "Acte 1b",
        click_function = "act1b",
    }

    )
end

function act1b()
    keziahRoom.position = locationCards['walterGillmansRoom'].getPosition()
    keziahRoom.rotation = locationCards['walterGillmansRoom'].getRotation()
    for k, card in pairs(locationCards) do
        self.putObject(card)
    end
    placeObj(keziahRoom)
    for i, GUID in ipairs(decayedDoors['Plus'].GUID) do
        self.putObject(getObjectFromGUID(GUID))
    end
    local blackBookCard
    for k, card in pairs(act1bCard) do
        if k == 'blackBook' then
            blackBookCard = placeObj(card)
        else
            placeObj(card)
        end
    end
    Wait.time(function()
        broadcastToAll('Mise en place terminée', { 0, 0.75, 0.75 })
        local encounterDeck = getOutOfPlayPile('encounterDeck')
        encounterDeck.shuffle()
        Wait.time(function()
            broadcastToAll("Un investigateur peut inclure prendre le contrôle du Livre Noir", "White")
            for i = 0, 5 do
                Wait.time(function() blackBookCard.highlightOn("White", 0.5) end, i)
            end
        end, 1)
    end, 3)
    self.clearButtons()
end

function buildUnknownPlacesDeck(tab, number)
    local row = {}
    for i = 1, #tab do
        local j = math.random(1, #tab)
        table.insert(row, tab[j])
        table.remove(tab, j)
    end
    local m = number + 1
    local n = math.random(1, m)
    table.insert(row, n, whitchHouse[1])
    return row
end

function getOutOfPlayPile(pile)
    local position = {
        x = outOfPlayPile[pile].position[1],
        y = outOfPlayPile[pile].position[2] - 2,
        z = outOfPlayPile[pile].position[3]
    }
    local hitList = Physics.cast({
        origin       = position,
        direction    = { 0, 1, 0 },
        type         = 3,
        size         = { 3, 10, 3 },
        max_distance = 0,
        debug        = false,
    })

    for _, object in ipairs(hitList) do
        local obj = object.hit_object
        if obj.type == "Deck" then
            return obj
        end
    end
end

function hasValue(tab, string)
    for i, v in ipairs(tab) do
        if v == string then
            return i
        end
    end
    return false
end

function placeObj(obj)
    local pickedUpCard = self.takeObject({
        guid = obj.GUID,
        rotation = obj.rotation
    })
    pickedUpCard.setPositionSmooth(obj.position, false, false)
    return pickedUpCard
end

function completeAllLocationsTable()
    local containedObjects = self.getData().ContainedObjects
    for k, obj in pairs(containedObjects) do
        if obj.Name == 'Card' then
            local metadata = Global.call('getMetadata', obj)
            if metadata then
                if
                    metadata.locationFront ~= nil then
                    local icon = metadata.locationFront.icons
                    if icon == 'Plus' then
                        table.insert(decayedDoors[icon].GUID, obj.GUID)
                    elseif
                        (metadata.traits ~= nil and metadata.id ~= '05137') then
                        for w in string.gmatch(metadata.traits, "%a+") do
                            if w == "Extradimensional" then
                                table.insert(unknownPlaces, obj.GUID)
                            end
                        end
                    end
                end
            end
        end
    end

    unknownPlaces = chooseAmongstInAtable(unknownPlaces, 6)
end

function chooseAmongstInAtable(tab, number)
    local row = {}
    for i = 1, number do
        local j = math.random(1, #tab)
        local k = math.random(1, #row + 1)
        table.insert(row, k, tab[j])
        table.remove(tab, j)
    end
    return row
end

ContainedObjects.Name: Custom_Model_Bag
ContainedObjects.LuaScript:
-- Utility memory bag by Directsun
-- Version 2.7.0
-- Fork of Memory Bag 2.0 by MrStump
--
-- Want to contribute? Create an issue or fork the code on GitHub and submit a pull request:
-- https://github.com/sunflowermans/TTS-UtilityMemoryBag


function updateSave()
    local data_to_save = {["ml"]=memoryList}
    saved_data = JSON.encode(data_to_save)
    self.script_state = saved_data
end

function combineMemoryFromBagsWithin()
    local bagObjList = self.getObjects()
    for _, bagObj in ipairs(bagObjList) do
        local data = bagObj.lua_script_state
        if data ~= nil then
            local j = JSON.decode(data)
            if j ~= nil and j.ml ~= nil then
                for guid, entry in pairs(j.ml) do
                    memoryList[guid] = entry
                end
            end
        end
    end
end

function updateMemoryWithMoves()
    memoryList = memoryListBackup
    --get the first transposed object's coordinates
    local obj = getObjectFromGUID(moveGuid)

    -- p1 is where needs to go, p2 is where it was
    local refObjPos = memoryList[moveGuid].pos
    local deltaPos = findOffsetDistance(obj.getPosition(), refObjPos, nil)
    local movedRotation = obj.getRotation()
    for guid, entry in pairs(memoryList) do
        memoryList[guid].pos.x = entry.pos.x - deltaPos.x
        memoryList[guid].pos.y = entry.pos.y - deltaPos.y
        memoryList[guid].pos.z = entry.pos.z - deltaPos.z
        -- memoryList[guid].rot.x = movedRotation.x
        -- memoryList[guid].rot.y = movedRotation.y
        -- memoryList[guid].rot.z = movedRotation.z
    end

    --theList[obj.getGUID()] = {
    --    pos={x=round(pos.x,4), y=round(pos.y,4), z=round(pos.z,4)},
    --    rot={x=round(rot.x,4), y=round(rot.y,4), z=round(rot.z,4)},
    --    lock=obj.getLock()
    --}
    moveList = {}
end

function onload(saved_data)

    fresh = true
    if saved_data ~= "" then
        local loaded_data = JSON.decode(saved_data)
        --Set up information off of loaded_data
        memoryList = loaded_data.ml
    else
        --Set up information for if there is no saved saved data
        memoryList = {}

    end

    moveList = {}
    moveGuid = nil

    if next(memoryList) == nil then
        createSetupButton()
    else
        fresh = false
        createMemoryActionButtons()
    end
end


--Beginning Setup


--Make setup button
 function createSetupButton()
    self.createButton({
      label="Config", click_function="buttonClick_setup", function_owner=self,
      position={0,0.1,-2.1}, rotation={0,0,0}, height=275, width=625,
      font_size=150, color={0,0,0}, font_color={1,1,1}
    })
 end

--Triggered by Transpose button
function buttonClick_transpose()
    moveGuid = nil
    broadcastToAll("Select one object and move it- all objects will move relative to the new location", {0.75, 0.75, 1})
    memoryListBackup = duplicateTable(memoryList)
    memoryList = {}
    moveList = {}
    self.clearButtons()
    self.clearInputs()
    createButtonsOnAllObjects(true)
    createSetupActionButtons(true)
end

--Triggered by setup button,
function buttonClick_setup()
    memoryListBackup = duplicateTable(memoryList)
    memoryList = {}
    self.clearButtons()
    self.clearInputs()
    createButtonsOnAllObjects(false)
    createSetupActionButtons(false)
end

function getAllObjectsInMemory()
    local objTable = {}
    local curObj = {}

    for guid in pairs(memoryListBackup) do
        curObj = getObjectFromGUID(guid)
        table.insert(objTable, curObj)
    end

    return objTable
    -- return getAllObjects()
end

--Creates selection buttons on objects
function createButtonsOnAllObjects(move)
    buttonIndexMap = {}
    local howManyButtons = 0

    local objsToHaveButtons = {}
    if move == true then
        objsToHaveButtons = getAllObjectsInMemory()
    else
        objsToHaveButtons = getAllObjects()
    end

    for _, obj in ipairs(objsToHaveButtons) do
        if obj ~= self then
            --On a normal bag, the button positions aren't the same size as the bag.
            globalScaleFactor = 1* 1/self.getScale().x
            --Super sweet math to set button positions
            local selfPos = self.getPosition()
            local objPos = obj.getPosition()
            local deltaPos = findOffsetDistance(selfPos, objPos, obj)
            local objPos = rotateLocalCoordinates(deltaPos, self)
            objPos.x = -objPos.x * globalScaleFactor
            objPos.y = objPos.y * globalScaleFactor + 2
            objPos.z = objPos.z * globalScaleFactor * 0.9
            --Workaround for custom PDFs
            if obj.Book then
                objPos.y = objPos.y + 0.5
            end
            --Offset rotation of bag
            local rot = self.getRotation()
            rot.y = -rot.y + 180
            --Create function
            local funcName = "selectButton_" .. howManyButtons
            local func = function() buttonClick_selection(obj, move) end
            local color = {0.75,0.25,0.25,0.6}
            local colorMove = {0,0,1,0.6}
            if move == true then
                color = colorMove
            end
            self.setVar(funcName, func)
            self.createButton({
                click_function=funcName, function_owner=self,
                position=objPos, rotation=rot, height=500, width=500,
                color=color,
            })
            buttonIndexMap[obj.getGUID()] = howManyButtons
            howManyButtons = howManyButtons + 1
        end
    end
end

--Creates submit and cancel buttons
function createSetupActionButtons(move)
    self.createButton({
        label="Annuler", click_function="buttonClick_cancel", function_owner=self,
      position={-0.7,0.1,2.1}, rotation={0,0,0}, height=275, width=625,
      font_size=145, color={0,0,0}, font_color={1,1,1}
    })

    self.createButton({
        label="Valider", click_function="buttonClick_submit", function_owner=self,
        position={-0.7,0.3,2.6}, rotation={0,0,0}, height=275, width=625,
        font_size=140, color={0,0,0}, font_color={1,1,1}
    })

    if move == false then
      self.createButton({
          label="Ajouter", click_function="buttonClick_add", function_owner=self,
          position={0.7,0.3,2.1}, rotation={0,0,0}, height=275, width=625,
          font_size=140, color={0,0,0}, font_color={0.25,1,0.25}
      })

        self.createButton({
            label="Sélection", click_function="editDragSelection", function_owner=self,
            position={-0.7,0.3,3.1}, rotation={0,0,0}, height=275, width=625,
            font_size=125, color={0,0,0}, font_color={1,1,1}
        })

        if fresh == false then
                self.createButton({
                    label="Mise à jour", click_function="buttonClick_setNew", function_owner=self,
                    position={0.7,0.3,3.1}, rotation={0,0,0}, height=275, width=625,
                    font_size=105, color={0,0,0}, font_color={0.75,0.75,1}
                })
                self.createButton({
                    label="Retirer", click_function="buttonClick_remove", function_owner=self,
                    position={0.7,0.3,2.6}, rotation={0,0,0}, height=275, width=625,
                    font_size=140, color={0,0,0}, font_color={1,0.25,0.25}
                })
            end
        end

        self.createButton({
            label="Reset", click_function="buttonClick_reset", function_owner=self,
            position={0,0.3,-2.1}, rotation={0,0,0}, height=275, width=625,
            font_size=165, color={0,0,0}, font_color={1,1,1}
        })
    end


--During Setup


--Checks or unchecks buttons
function buttonClick_selection(obj, move)
    local index = buttonIndexMap[obj.getGUID()]
    local colorMove = {0,0,1,0.6}
    local color = {0,1,0,0.6}

    previousGuid = selectedGuid
    selectedGuid = obj.getGUID()

    theList = memoryList
    if move == true then
        theList = moveList
        if previousGuid ~= nil and previousGuid ~= selectedGuid then
            local prevObj = getObjectFromGUID(previousGuid)
            prevObj.highlightOff()
            self.editButton({index=previousIndex, color=colorMove})
            theList[previousGuid] = nil
        end
        previousIndex = index
    end

    if theList[selectedGuid] == nil then
        self.editButton({index=index, color=color})
        --Adding pos/rot to memory table
        local pos, rot = obj.getPosition(), obj.getRotation()
        --I need to add it like this or it won't save due to indexing issue
        theList[obj.getGUID()] = {
            pos={x=round(pos.x,4), y=round(pos.y,4), z=round(pos.z,4)},
            rot={x=round(rot.x,4), y=round(rot.y,4), z=round(rot.z,4)},
            lock=obj.getLock(),
            tint=obj.getColorTint()
        }
        obj.highlightOn({0,1,0})
    else
        color = {0.75,0.25,0.25,0.6}
        if move == true then
            color = colorMove
        end
        self.editButton({index=index, color=color})
        theList[obj.getGUID()] = nil
        obj.highlightOff()
    end
end

function editDragSelection(bagObj, player, remove)
    local selectedObjs = Player[player].getSelectedObjects()
    if not remove then
        for _, obj in ipairs(selectedObjs) do
            local index = buttonIndexMap[obj.getGUID()]
            --Ignore if already in the memory list, or does not have a button
            if index and not memoryList[obj.getGUID()] then
                self.editButton({index=index, color={0,1,0,0.6}})
                --Adding pos/rot to memory table
                local pos, rot = obj.getPosition(), obj.getRotation()
                --I need to add it like this or it won't save due to indexing issue
                memoryList[obj.getGUID()] = {
                    pos={x=round(pos.x,4), y=round(pos.y,4), z=round(pos.z,4)},
                    rot={x=round(rot.x,4), y=round(rot.y,4), z=round(rot.z,4)},
                    lock=obj.getLock(),
                    tint=obj.getColorTint()
                }
                obj.highlightOn({0,1,0})
            end
        end
    else
        for _, obj in ipairs(selectedObjs) do
            local index = buttonIndexMap[obj.getGUID()]
            if index and memoryList[obj.getGUID()] then
                color = {0.75,0.25,0.25,0.6}
                self.editButton({index=index, color=color})
                memoryList[obj.getGUID()] = nil
                obj.highlightOff()
            end
        end
    end
end

--Cancels selection process
function buttonClick_cancel()
    memoryList = memoryListBackup
    moveList = {}
    self.clearButtons()
    self.clearInputs()
    if next(memoryList) == nil then
        createSetupButton()
    else
        createMemoryActionButtons()
    end
    removeAllHighlights()
    broadcastToAll("Sélection annulée", {1,1,1})
    moveGuid = nil
end

--Saves selections
function buttonClick_submit()
    fresh = false
    if next(moveList) ~= nil then
        for guid in pairs(moveList) do
            moveGuid = guid
        end
        if memoryListBackup[moveGuid] == nil then
            broadcastToAll("Item selected for moving is not already in memory", {1, 0.25, 0.25})
        else
            broadcastToAll("Moving all items in memory relative to new objects position!", {0.75, 0.75, 1})
            self.clearButtons()
            self.clearInputs()
            createMemoryActionButtons()
            local count = 0
            for guid in pairs(moveList) do
                moveGuid = guid
                count = count + 1
                local obj = getObjectFromGUID(guid)
                if obj ~= nil then obj.highlightOff() end
            end
            updateMemoryWithMoves()
            updateSave()
            buttonClick_place()
        end
    elseif next(memoryList) == nil and moveGuid == nil then
        memoryList = memoryListBackup
        broadcastToAll("No selections made.", {0.75, 0.25, 0.25})
    end
    combineMemoryFromBagsWithin()
    self.clearButtons()
    self.clearInputs()
    createMemoryActionButtons()
    local count = 0
    for guid in pairs(memoryList) do
        count = count + 1
        local obj = getObjectFromGUID(guid)
        if obj ~= nil then obj.highlightOff() end
    end
    broadcastToAll(count.." Objects Saved", {1,1,1})
    updateSave()
    moveGuid = nil
end

function combineTables(first_table, second_table)
    for k,v in pairs(second_table) do first_table[k] = v end
end

function buttonClick_add()
    fresh = false
    combineTables(memoryList, memoryListBackup)
    broadcastToAll("Adding internal bags and selections to existing memory", {0.25, 0.75, 0.25})
    combineMemoryFromBagsWithin()
    self.clearButtons()
    self.clearInputs()
    createMemoryActionButtons()
    local count = 0
    for guid in pairs(memoryList) do
        count = count + 1
        local obj = getObjectFromGUID(guid)
        if obj ~= nil then obj.highlightOff() end
    end
    broadcastToAll(count.." Objects Saved", {1,1,1})
    updateSave()
end

function buttonClick_remove()
    broadcastToAll("Removing Selected Entries From Memory", {1.0, 0.25, 0.25})
    self.clearButtons()
    self.clearInputs()
    createMemoryActionButtons()
    local count = 0
    for guid in pairs(memoryList) do
        count = count + 1
        memoryListBackup[guid] = nil
        local obj = getObjectFromGUID(guid)
        if obj ~= nil then obj.highlightOff() end
    end
    broadcastToAll(count.." Objects Removed", {1,1,1})
    memoryList = memoryListBackup
    updateSave()
end

function buttonClick_setNew()
    broadcastToAll("Setting new position relative to items in memory", {0.75, 0.75, 1})
    self.clearButtons()
    self.clearInputs()
    createMemoryActionButtons()
    local count = 0
    for _, obj in ipairs(getAllObjects()) do
        guid = obj.guid
        if memoryListBackup[guid] ~= nil then
            count = count + 1
            memoryListBackup[guid].pos = obj.getPosition()
            memoryListBackup[guid].rot = obj.getRotation()
            memoryListBackup[guid].lock = obj.getLock()
            memoryListBackup[guid].tint = obj.getColorTint()
        end
    end
    broadcastToAll(count.." Objects Saved", {1,1,1})
    memoryList = memoryListBackup
    updateSave()
end

--Resets bag to starting status
function buttonClick_reset()
    fresh = true
    memoryList = {}
    self.clearButtons()
    self.clearInputs()
    createSetupButton()
    removeAllHighlights()
    broadcastToAll("Tool Reset", {1,1,1})
    updateSave()
end


--After Setup


--Creates recall and place buttons
function createMemoryActionButtons()
    self.createButton({
        label="Placer", click_function="buttonClick_place", function_owner=self,
        position={0.7,0.1,2.2}, rotation={0,0,0}, height=275, width=625,
        font_size=150, color={0,0,0}, font_color={1,1,1}
    })
    self.createButton({
        label="Ranger", click_function="buttonClick_recall", function_owner=self,
        position={-0.7,0.1,2.2}, rotation={0,0,0}, height=275, width=625,
        font_size=150, color={0,0,0}, font_color={1,1,1}
    })
    self.createButton({
        label="Config", click_function="buttonClick_setup", function_owner=self,
        position={0,0.1,-2.2}, rotation={0,0,0}, height=275, width=625,
        font_size=150, color={0,0,0}, font_color={1,1,1}
    })
    ---    self.createButton({
    ---      label="Bouger", click_function="buttonClick_transpose", function_owner=self,
    ---      position={-2,0.3,0.8}, rotation={0,270,0}, height=350, width=800,
    ---      font_size=250, color={0,0,0}, font_color={0.75,0.75,1}
    ---
end

--Sends objects from bag/table to their saved position/rotation
function buttonClick_place()
    local bagObjList = self.getObjects()
    for guid, entry in pairs(memoryList) do
        local obj = getObjectFromGUID(guid)
        --If obj is out on the table, move it to the saved pos/rot
        if obj ~= nil then
            obj.setPositionSmooth(entry.pos)
            obj.setRotationSmooth(entry.rot)
            obj.setLock(entry.lock)
            obj.setColorTint(entry.tint)
        else
            --If obj is inside of the bag
            for _, bagObj in ipairs(bagObjList) do
                if bagObj.guid == guid then
                    local item = self.takeObject({
                        guid=guid, position=entry.pos, rotation=entry.rot, smooth=false
                    })
                    item.setLock(entry.lock)
                    item.setColorTint(entry.tint)
                    break
                end
            end
        end
    end
    broadcastToAll("Objets placés", {1,1,1})
end

--Recalls objects to bag from table
function buttonClick_recall()
    for guid, entry in pairs(memoryList) do
        local obj = getObjectFromGUID(guid)
        if obj ~= nil then self.putObject(obj) end
    end
    broadcastToAll("Objets rangés", {1,1,1})
end


--Utility functions


--Find delta (difference) between 2 x/y/z coordinates
function findOffsetDistance(p1, p2, obj)
    local yOffset = 0
    if obj ~= nil then
        local bounds = obj.getBounds()
        yOffset = (bounds.size.y - bounds.offset.y)
    end
    local deltaPos = {}
    deltaPos.x = (p2.x-p1.x)
    deltaPos.y = (p2.y-p1.y) + yOffset
    deltaPos.z = (p2.z-p1.z)
    return deltaPos
end

--Used to rotate a set of coordinates by an angle
function rotateLocalCoordinates(desiredPos, obj)
    local objPos, objRot = obj.getPosition(), obj.getRotation()
    local angle = math.rad(objRot.y)
    local x = desiredPos.x * math.cos(angle) - desiredPos.z * math.sin(angle)
    local z = desiredPos.x * math.sin(angle) + desiredPos.z * math.cos(angle)
    --return {x=objPos.x+x, y=objPos.y+desiredPos.y, z=objPos.z+z}
    return {x=x, y=desiredPos.y, z=z}
end

function rotateMyCoordinates(desiredPos, obj)
    local angle = math.rad(obj.getRotation().y)
    local x = desiredPos.x * math.sin(angle)
    local z = desiredPos.z * math.cos(angle)
    return {x=x, y=desiredPos.y, z=z}
end

--Coroutine delay, in seconds
function wait(time)
    local start = os.time()
    repeat coroutine.yield(0) until os.time() > start + time
end

--Duplicates a table (needed to prevent it making reference to the same objects)
function duplicateTable(oldTable)
    local newTable = {}
    for k, v in pairs(oldTable) do
        newTable[k] = v
    end
    return newTable
end

--Moves scripted highlight from all objects
function removeAllHighlights()
    for _, obj in ipairs(getAllObjects()) do
        obj.highlightOff()
    end
end

--Round number (num) to the Nth decimal (dec)
function round(num, dec)
    local mult = 10^(dec or 0)
    return math.floor(num * mult + 0.5) / mult
end


--[[
This object provides access to a variable stored on the "Global script".
The variable holds the GUIDs for every Utility Memory Bag in the scene.
Example:
{'805ebd', '35cc21', 'fc8886', 'f50264', '5f5f63'}
--]]
AllMemoryBagsInScene = {
    NAME_OF_GLOBAL_VARIABLE = "_UtilityMemoryBag_AllMemoryBagsInScene"
}

function AllMemoryBagsInScene:add(guid)
    local guids = Global.getTable(self.NAME_OF_GLOBAL_VARIABLE) or {}
    table.insert(guids, guid)
    Global.setTable(self.NAME_OF_GLOBAL_VARIABLE, guids)
end

function AllMemoryBagsInScene:getGuidList()
    return Global.getTable(self.NAME_OF_GLOBAL_VARIABLE) or {}
end

ContainedObjects.Name: Custom_Tile
ContainedObjects.Nickname: Mise en place du Chaos Bag
ContainedObjects.LuaScript:
jacqueline_guid = '42cd6e'

buttonparams = {
   ['easy'] = {label = "Facile", click_function = 'modeEasy', z_i = -0.2},
   ['normal'] = {label = "Standard", click_function = 'modeNormal', z_i = 0.1},
   ['hard'] = {label = "Difficile", click_function = 'modeHard', z_i = 0.4},
   ['expert'] = {label = "Expert", click_function = 'modeExpert', z_i = 0.7},
   ['standalone'] = {label = "Indépendant", click_function = 'modeStandalone', z_i = 0},
}

function onLoad()

    metadata = JSON.decode(self.getGMNotes())
    buttontable = {}
    for key, value in pairs(buttonparams) do
        if metadata[key] == true then
            table.insert(buttontable,value)
        end
        
    end

    for _, button in pairs(buttontable) do
        local data = {
            click_function = button.click_function, 
            function_owner = self, 
            label = button.label, 
            position = {0, 0.1, button.z_i}, 
            scale = {0.3, 0.5, 0.3}, 
            width = 1500, 
            height = 400, 
            font_size = 250, 
            tooltip = "Chaos bag du mode "..button.label,
            color = {0.5647, 0.4627, 0.2353, 1}, 
            font_color = {0.9041, 0.8313, 0.7356, 1},
            hover_color = {99/255, 85/255, 48/255},
            press_color = {192/255, 152/255, 94/255} }
        self.createButton(data)
        
    end
    jacqueline = getObjectFromGUID(jacqueline_guid)
    chaosdata = jacqueline.getTable('chaosdata')
end

function modeEasy()
    local  params ={}
     params.mode = 'easy'

end

function setUp()
    local params = {}
    params.rotation = { 0, 180, 0 }
    for i, v in ipairs(deserIslandTable.position) do
        params.position = v
        params.GUID = deserIslandTable.GUID[i]
        placeObj(params)
    end
    params.position = { -32.50, 1.81, 3.00 }
    for i, v in ipairs(actVersions.enemies) do
        params.GUID = v
        placeObj(params)
        params.position[1] = params.position[1] + 2.5
    end
    params.position = outOfPlayPile['actDeck'].position
    params.rotation = { 0, 90, 0 }
    for i = 1, 4 do
        Wait.frames(function()
            params.GUID = actVersions.actDeck[i]
            placeObj(params)
            params.position[2] = params.position[2] + i / 10
        end, i)
    end
    Wait.time(function()
        local deck = getOutOfPlayPile('encounterDeck')
        deck.shuffle()
        deck = getOutOfPlayPile('desertIslandPile')
        deck.shuffle()
        deck.setName('Lieux "Île Déserte" ')
        broadcastToAll('Mise en place terminée', { 0, 0.75, 0.75 })
    end, 2)


    self.clearButtons()
    createRandomStoryCard()
end

function createRandomStoryCard()
    self.createButton({
        label = 'Cartes histoire',
        click_function = "spawnMissing",
        function_owner = self,
        position = { 0, 0.3, 1.8 },
        rotation = { 0, 0, 0 },
        scale = { 1.2, 1.2, 1.2 },
        height = 350,
        width = 1400,
        font_size = 200,
        color = { 0, 0, 0 },
        font_color = { 1, 1, 1 },
        tooltip = 'Cliquez pour distribuer les cartes Histoire'
    })
end

function spawnMissing()
    local n = 0

    for i, v in ipairs(missingTable.cardID) do
        if missingPersons[v].spawn == true then
            n = n + 1
            local row = {}
            row.position = missingTable.positions[n]
            row.rotation = { 0, 180, 180 }
            row.GUID = missingPersons[v].storyCard
            placeObj(row)
            row.position[1] = row.position[1] + 2.5
            row.rotation = { 0, 180, 0 }
            row.GUID = missingPersons[v].asset
            placeObj(row)
        end
    end
    self.clearButtons()
end

---comment
---@param icon any string matching with an icon name
---@param number any number of card that must be chosen
function chooseAmongstInAtable(tab, number)
    local row = {}
    for i = 1, number do
        local j = math.random(1, #tab)
        table.insert(row, tab[j])
        table.remove(tab, j)
    end
    return row
end

function getOutOfPlayPile(pile)
    local position = {
        x = outOfPlayPile[pile].position[1],
        y = outOfPlayPile[pile].position[2],
        z = outOfPlayPile[pile].position[3]
    }
    local hitList = Physics.cast({
        origin       = position,
        direction    = { 0, 1, 0 },
        type         = 3,
        size         = { 2, 10, 2 },
        max_distance = 0,
        debug        = false,
    })

    for _, object in ipairs(hitList) do
        local obj = object.hit_object
        if obj.type == "Deck" then
            return obj
        end
    end
end

function placeObj(obj)
    local pickedUpCard = self.takeObject({
        guid = obj.GUID,
        rotation = obj.rotation
    })
    pickedUpCard.setPositionSmooth(obj.position, false, false)
    return pickedUpCard
end

function buildRandomTable()
    local containedObjects = self.getData().ContainedObjects
    for k, obj in pairs(containedObjects) do
        if obj.Name == 'Card' then
            local metadata = Global.call('getMetadata', obj)
            if metadata then
                if
                    metadata.type == 'Asset' then
                    table.insert(missingTable.cardID, metadata.id)
                elseif metadata.locationFront ~= nil then
                    if string.find(metadata.locationFront.icons, 'Tilde') then
                        table.insert(deserIslandTable.GUID, obj.GUID)
                    end
                end
            end
        end
    end
end

ContainedObjects.LuaScript:
-- Utility memory bag by Directsun
-- Version 2.7.0
-- Fork of Memory Bag 2.0 by MrStump
--
-- Want to contribute? Create an issue or fork the code on GitHub and submit a pull request:
-- https://github.com/sunflowermans/TTS-UtilityMemoryBag


function updateSave()
    local data_to_save = {["ml"]=memoryList}
    saved_data = JSON.encode(data_to_save)
    self.script_state = saved_data
end

function combineMemoryFromBagsWithin()
    local bagObjList = self.getObjects()
    for _, bagObj in ipairs(bagObjList) do
        local data = bagObj.lua_script_state
        if data ~= nil then
            local j = JSON.decode(data)
            if j ~= nil and j.ml ~= nil then
                for guid, entry in pairs(j.ml) do
                    memoryList[guid] = entry
                end
            end
        end
    end
end

function updateMemoryWithMoves()
    memoryList = memoryListBackup
    --get the first transposed object's coordinates
    local obj = getObjectFromGUID(moveGuid)

    -- p1 is where needs to go, p2 is where it was
    local refObjPos = memoryList[moveGuid].pos
    local deltaPos = findOffsetDistance(obj.getPosition(), refObjPos, nil)
    local movedRotation = obj.getRotation()
    for guid, entry in pairs(memoryList) do
        memoryList[guid].pos.x = entry.pos.x - deltaPos.x
        memoryList[guid].pos.y = entry.pos.y - deltaPos.y
        memoryList[guid].pos.z = entry.pos.z - deltaPos.z
        -- memoryList[guid].rot.x = movedRotation.x
        -- memoryList[guid].rot.y = movedRotation.y
        -- memoryList[guid].rot.z = movedRotation.z
    end

    --theList[obj.getGUID()] = {
    --    pos={x=round(pos.x,4), y=round(pos.y,4), z=round(pos.z,4)},
    --    rot={x=round(rot.x,4), y=round(rot.y,4), z=round(rot.z,4)},
    --    lock=obj.getLock()
    --}
    moveList = {}
end

function onload(saved_data)

    fresh = true
    if saved_data ~= "" then
        local loaded_data = JSON.decode(saved_data)
        --Set up information off of loaded_data
        memoryList = loaded_data.ml
    else
        --Set up information for if there is no saved saved data
        memoryList = {}

    end

    moveList = {}
    moveGuid = nil

    if next(memoryList) == nil then
        createSetupButton()
    else
        fresh = false
        createMemoryActionButtons()
    end
end


--Beginning Setup


--Make setup button
 function createSetupButton()
    self.createButton({
      label="Config", click_function="buttonClick_setup", function_owner=self,
      position={0,0.1,-2.1}, rotation={0,0,0}, height=275, width=625,
      font_size=150, color={0,0,0}, font_color={1,1,1}
    })
 end

--Triggered by Transpose button
function buttonClick_transpose()
    moveGuid = nil
    broadcastToAll("Select one object and move it- all objects will move relative to the new location", {0.75, 0.75, 1})
    memoryListBackup = duplicateTable(memoryList)
    memoryList = {}
    moveList = {}
    self.clearButtons()
    self.clearInputs()
    createButtonsOnAllObjects(true)
    createSetupActionButtons(true)
end

--Triggered by setup button,
function buttonClick_setup()
    memoryListBackup = duplicateTable(memoryList)
    memoryList = {}
    self.clearButtons()
    self.clearInputs()
    createButtonsOnAllObjects(false)
    createSetupActionButtons(false)
end

function getAllObjectsInMemory()
    local objTable = {}
    local curObj = {}

    for guid in pairs(memoryListBackup) do
        curObj = getObjectFromGUID(guid)
        table.insert(objTable, curObj)
    end

    return objTable
    -- return getAllObjects()
end

--Creates selection buttons on objects
function createButtonsOnAllObjects(move)
    buttonIndexMap = {}
    local howManyButtons = 0

    local objsToHaveButtons = {}
    if move == true then
        objsToHaveButtons = getAllObjectsInMemory()
    else
        objsToHaveButtons = getAllObjects()
    end

    for _, obj in ipairs(objsToHaveButtons) do
        if obj ~= self then
            --On a normal bag, the button positions aren't the same size as the bag.
            globalScaleFactor = 1* 1/self.getScale().x
            --Super sweet math to set button positions
            local selfPos = self.getPosition()
            local objPos = obj.getPosition()
            local deltaPos = findOffsetDistance(selfPos, objPos, obj)
            local objPos = rotateLocalCoordinates(deltaPos, self)
            objPos.x = -objPos.x * globalScaleFactor
            objPos.y = objPos.y * globalScaleFactor + 2
            objPos.z = objPos.z * globalScaleFactor * 0.9
            --Workaround for custom PDFs
            if obj.Book then
                objPos.y = objPos.y + 0.5
            end
            --Offset rotation of bag
            local rot = self.getRotation()
            rot.y = -rot.y + 180
            --Create function
            local funcName = "selectButton_" .. howManyButtons
            local func = function() buttonClick_selection(obj, move) end
            local color = {0.75,0.25,0.25,0.6}
            local colorMove = {0,0,1,0.6}
            if move == true then
                color = colorMove
            end
            self.setVar(funcName, func)
            self.createButton({
                click_function=funcName, function_owner=self,
                position=objPos, rotation=rot, height=500, width=500,
                color=color,
            })
            buttonIndexMap[obj.getGUID()] = howManyButtons
            howManyButtons = howManyButtons + 1
        end
    end
end

--Creates submit and cancel buttons
function createSetupActionButtons(move)
    self.createButton({
        label="Annuler", click_function="buttonClick_cancel", function_owner=self,
      position={-0.7,0.1,2.1}, rotation={0,0,0}, height=275, width=625,
      font_size=145, color={0,0,0}, font_color={1,1,1}
    })

    self.createButton({
        label="Valider", click_function="buttonClick_submit", function_owner=self,
        position={-0.7,0.3,2.6}, rotation={0,0,0}, height=275, width=625,
        font_size=140, color={0,0,0}, font_color={1,1,1}
    })

    if move == false then
      self.createButton({
          label="Ajouter", click_function="buttonClick_add", function_owner=self,
          position={0.7,0.3,2.1}, rotation={0,0,0}, height=275, width=625,
          font_size=140, color={0,0,0}, font_color={0.25,1,0.25}
      })

        self.createButton({
            label="Sélection", click_function="editDragSelection", function_owner=self,
            position={-0.7,0.3,3.1}, rotation={0,0,0}, height=275, width=625,
            font_size=125, color={0,0,0}, font_color={1,1,1}
        })

        if fresh == false then
                self.createButton({
                    label="Mise à jour", click_function="buttonClick_setNew", function_owner=self,
                    position={0.7,0.3,3.1}, rotation={0,0,0}, height=275, width=625,
                    font_size=105, color={0,0,0}, font_color={0.75,0.75,1}
                })
                self.createButton({
                    label="Retirer", click_function="buttonClick_remove", function_owner=self,
                    position={0.7,0.3,2.6}, rotation={0,0,0}, height=275, width=625,
                    font_size=140, color={0,0,0}, font_color={1,0.25,0.25}
                })
            end
        end

        self.createButton({
            label="Reset", click_function="buttonClick_reset", function_owner=self,
            position={0,0.3,-2.1}, rotation={0,0,0}, height=275, width=625,
            font_size=165, color={0,0,0}, font_color={1,1,1}
        })
    end


--During Setup


--Checks or unchecks buttons
function buttonClick_selection(obj, move)
    local index = buttonIndexMap[obj.getGUID()]
    local colorMove = {0,0,1,0.6}
    local color = {0,1,0,0.6}

    previousGuid = selectedGuid
    selectedGuid = obj.getGUID()

    theList = memoryList
    if move == true then
        theList = moveList
        if previousGuid ~= nil and previousGuid ~= selectedGuid then
            local prevObj = getObjectFromGUID(previousGuid)
            prevObj.highlightOff()
            self.editButton({index=previousIndex, color=colorMove})
            theList[previousGuid] = nil
        end
        previousIndex = index
    end

    if theList[selectedGuid] == nil then
        self.editButton({index=index, color=color})
        --Adding pos/rot to memory table
        local pos, rot = obj.getPosition(), obj.getRotation()
        --I need to add it like this or it won't save due to indexing issue
        theList[obj.getGUID()] = {
            pos={x=round(pos.x,4), y=round(pos.y,4), z=round(pos.z,4)},
            rot={x=round(rot.x,4), y=round(rot.y,4), z=round(rot.z,4)},
            lock=obj.getLock(),
            tint=obj.getColorTint()
        }
        obj.highlightOn({0,1,0})
    else
        color = {0.75,0.25,0.25,0.6}
        if move == true then
            color = colorMove
        end
        self.editButton({index=index, color=color})
        theList[obj.getGUID()] = nil
        obj.highlightOff()
    end
end

function editDragSelection(bagObj, player, remove)
    local selectedObjs = Player[player].getSelectedObjects()
    if not remove then
        for _, obj in ipairs(selectedObjs) do
            local index = buttonIndexMap[obj.getGUID()]
            --Ignore if already in the memory list, or does not have a button
            if index and not memoryList[obj.getGUID()] then
                self.editButton({index=index, color={0,1,0,0.6}})
                --Adding pos/rot to memory table
                local pos, rot = obj.getPosition(), obj.getRotation()
                --I need to add it like this or it won't save due to indexing issue
                memoryList[obj.getGUID()] = {
                    pos={x=round(pos.x,4), y=round(pos.y,4), z=round(pos.z,4)},
                    rot={x=round(rot.x,4), y=round(rot.y,4), z=round(rot.z,4)},
                    lock=obj.getLock(),
                    tint=obj.getColorTint()
                }
                obj.highlightOn({0,1,0})
            end
        end
    else
        for _, obj in ipairs(selectedObjs) do
            local index = buttonIndexMap[obj.getGUID()]
            if index and memoryList[obj.getGUID()] then
                color = {0.75,0.25,0.25,0.6}
                self.editButton({index=index, color=color})
                memoryList[obj.getGUID()] = nil
                obj.highlightOff()
            end
        end
    end
end

--Cancels selection process
function buttonClick_cancel()
    memoryList = memoryListBackup
    moveList = {}
    self.clearButtons()
    self.clearInputs()
    if next(memoryList) == nil then
        createSetupButton()
    else
        createMemoryActionButtons()
    end
    removeAllHighlights()
    broadcastToAll("Sélection annulée", {1,1,1})
    moveGuid = nil
end

--Saves selections
function buttonClick_submit()
    fresh = false
    if next(moveList) ~= nil then
        for guid in pairs(moveList) do
            moveGuid = guid
        end
        if memoryListBackup[moveGuid] == nil then
            broadcastToAll("Item selected for moving is not already in memory", {1, 0.25, 0.25})
        else
            broadcastToAll("Moving all items in memory relative to new objects position!", {0.75, 0.75, 1})
            self.clearButtons()
            self.clearInputs()
            createMemoryActionButtons()
            local count = 0
            for guid in pairs(moveList) do
                moveGuid = guid
                count = count + 1
                local obj = getObjectFromGUID(guid)
                if obj ~= nil then obj.highlightOff() end
            end
            updateMemoryWithMoves()
            updateSave()
            buttonClick_place()
        end
    elseif next(memoryList) == nil and moveGuid == nil then
        memoryList = memoryListBackup
        broadcastToAll("No selections made.", {0.75, 0.25, 0.25})
    end
    combineMemoryFromBagsWithin()
    self.clearButtons()
    self.clearInputs()
    createMemoryActionButtons()
    local count = 0
    for guid in pairs(memoryList) do
        count = count + 1
        local obj = getObjectFromGUID(guid)
        if obj ~= nil then obj.highlightOff() end
    end
    broadcastToAll(count.." Objects Saved", {1,1,1})
    updateSave()
    moveGuid = nil
end

function combineTables(first_table, second_table)
    for k,v in pairs(second_table) do first_table[k] = v end
end

function buttonClick_add()
    fresh = false
    combineTables(memoryList, memoryListBackup)
    broadcastToAll("Adding internal bags and selections to existing memory", {0.25, 0.75, 0.25})
    combineMemoryFromBagsWithin()
    self.clearButtons()
    self.clearInputs()
    createMemoryActionButtons()
    local count = 0
    for guid in pairs(memoryList) do
        count = count + 1
        local obj = getObjectFromGUID(guid)
        if obj ~= nil then obj.highlightOff() end
    end
    broadcastToAll(count.." Objects Saved", {1,1,1})
    updateSave()
end

function buttonClick_remove()
    broadcastToAll("Removing Selected Entries From Memory", {1.0, 0.25, 0.25})
    self.clearButtons()
    self.clearInputs()
    createMemoryActionButtons()
    local count = 0
    for guid in pairs(memoryList) do
        count = count + 1
        memoryListBackup[guid] = nil
        local obj = getObjectFromGUID(guid)
        if obj ~= nil then obj.highlightOff() end
    end
    broadcastToAll(count.." Objects Removed", {1,1,1})
    memoryList = memoryListBackup
    updateSave()
end

function buttonClick_setNew()
    broadcastToAll("Setting new position relative to items in memory", {0.75, 0.75, 1})
    self.clearButtons()
    self.clearInputs()
    createMemoryActionButtons()
    local count = 0
    for _, obj in ipairs(getAllObjects()) do
        guid = obj.guid
        if memoryListBackup[guid] ~= nil then
            count = count + 1
            memoryListBackup[guid].pos = obj.getPosition()
            memoryListBackup[guid].rot = obj.getRotation()
            memoryListBackup[guid].lock = obj.getLock()
            memoryListBackup[guid].tint = obj.getColorTint()
        end
    end
    broadcastToAll(count.." Objects Saved", {1,1,1})
    memoryList = memoryListBackup
    updateSave()
end

--Resets bag to starting status
function buttonClick_reset()
    fresh = true
    memoryList = {}
    self.clearButtons()
    self.clearInputs()
    createSetupButton()
    removeAllHighlights()
    broadcastToAll("Tool Reset", {1,1,1})
    updateSave()
end


--After Setup


--Creates recall and place buttons
function createMemoryActionButtons()
    self.createButton({
        label="Placer", click_function="buttonClick_place", function_owner=self,
        position={0.7,0.1,2.2}, rotation={0,0,0}, height=275, width=625,
        font_size=150, color={0,0,0}, font_color={1,1,1}
    })
    self.createButton({
        label="Ranger", click_function="buttonClick_recall", function_owner=self,
        position={-0.7,0.1,2.2}, rotation={0,0,0}, height=275, width=625,
        font_size=150, color={0,0,0}, font_color={1,1,1}
    })
    self.createButton({
        label="Config", click_function="buttonClick_setup", function_owner=self,
        position={0,0.1,-2.2}, rotation={0,0,0}, height=275, width=625,
        font_size=150, color={0,0,0}, font_color={1,1,1}
    })
    ---    self.createButton({
    ---      label="Bouger", click_function="buttonClick_transpose", function_owner=self,
    ---      position={-2,0.3,0.8}, rotation={0,270,0}, height=350, width=800,
    ---      font_size=250, color={0,0,0}, font_color={0.75,0.75,1}
    ---
end

--Sends objects from bag/table to their saved position/rotation
function buttonClick_place()
    local bagObjList = self.getObjects()
    for guid, entry in pairs(memoryList) do
        local obj = getObjectFromGUID(guid)
        --If obj is out on the table, move it to the saved pos/rot
        if obj ~= nil then
            obj.setPositionSmooth(entry.pos)
            obj.setRotationSmooth(entry.rot)
            obj.setLock(entry.lock)
            obj.setColorTint(entry.tint)
        else
            --If obj is inside of the bag
            for _, bagObj in ipairs(bagObjList) do
                if bagObj.guid == guid then
                    local item = self.takeObject({
                        guid=guid, position=entry.pos, rotation=entry.rot, smooth=false
                    })
                    item.setLock(entry.lock)
                    item.setColorTint(entry.tint)
                    break
                end
            end
        end
    end
    broadcastToAll("Objets placés", {1,1,1})
end

--Recalls objects to bag from table
function buttonClick_recall()
    for guid, entry in pairs(memoryList) do
        local obj = getObjectFromGUID(guid)
        if obj ~= nil then self.putObject(obj) end
    end
    broadcastToAll("Objets rangés", {1,1,1})
end


--Utility functions


--Find delta (difference) between 2 x/y/z coordinates
function findOffsetDistance(p1, p2, obj)
    local yOffset = 0
    if obj ~= nil then
        local bounds = obj.getBounds()
        yOffset = (bounds.size.y - bounds.offset.y)
    end
    local deltaPos = {}
    deltaPos.x = (p2.x-p1.x)
    deltaPos.y = (p2.y-p1.y) + yOffset
    deltaPos.z = (p2.z-p1.z)
    return deltaPos
end

--Used to rotate a set of coordinates by an angle
function rotateLocalCoordinates(desiredPos, obj)
    local objPos, objRot = obj.getPosition(), obj.getRotation()
    local angle = math.rad(objRot.y)
    local x = desiredPos.x * math.cos(angle) - desiredPos.z * math.sin(angle)
    local z = desiredPos.x * math.sin(angle) + desiredPos.z * math.cos(angle)
    --return {x=objPos.x+x, y=objPos.y+desiredPos.y, z=objPos.z+z}
    return {x=x, y=desiredPos.y, z=z}
end

function rotateMyCoordinates(desiredPos, obj)
    local angle = math.rad(obj.getRotation().y)
    local x = desiredPos.x * math.sin(angle)
    local z = desiredPos.z * math.cos(angle)
    return {x=x, y=desiredPos.y, z=z}
end

--Coroutine delay, in seconds
function wait(time)
    local start = os.time()
    repeat coroutine.yield(0) until os.time() > start + time
end

--Duplicates a table (needed to prevent it making reference to the same objects)
function duplicateTable(oldTable)
    local newTable = {}
    for k, v in pairs(oldTable) do
        newTable[k] = v
    end
    return newTable
end

--Moves scripted highlight from all objects
function removeAllHighlights()
    for _, obj in ipairs(getAllObjects()) do
        obj.highlightOff()
    end
end

--Round number (num) to the Nth decimal (dec)
function round(num, dec)
    local mult = 10^(dec or 0)
    return math.floor(num * mult + 0.5) / mult
end


--[[
This object provides access to a variable stored on the "Global script".
The variable holds the GUIDs for every Utility Memory Bag in the scene.
Example:
{'805ebd', '35cc21', 'fc8886', 'f50264', '5f5f63'}
--]]
AllMemoryBagsInScene = {
    NAME_OF_GLOBAL_VARIABLE = "_UtilityMemoryBag_AllMemoryBagsInScene"
}

function AllMemoryBagsInScene:add(guid)
    local guids = Global.getTable(self.NAME_OF_GLOBAL_VARIABLE) or {}
    table.insert(guids, guid)
    Global.setTable(self.NAME_OF_GLOBAL_VARIABLE, guids)
end

function AllMemoryBagsInScene:getGuidList()
    return Global.getTable(self.NAME_OF_GLOBAL_VARIABLE) or {}
end

local outOfPlayPile = {
    ['encounterDeck'] = {
        position = { 30.50, 3.61, -3.00 } },
    ['actDeck'] = {
        position = { 17.50, 1.54, -6.02 } }
}

local location = { ['Crescent'] = { position = { -2.00, 1.52, 18.00 }, rotation = { 0, 180, 0 } } }

local versions = {
    infilter = {
        ['Diamond'] = { position = { 4.00, 1.52, 0.50 }, rotation = { 0, 180, 0 }, GUID = 'a8c851' },
        ['Circle'] = { position = { -2.00, 1.52, 9.00 }, rotation = { 0, 180, 0 }, GUID = '886430' },
        ['Tee'] = { position = { 10.00, 1.52, 9.00 }, rotation = { 0, 180, 0 }, GUID = '3df94e' },
        ['Encounter'] = { position = { 30.50, 3.61, -3.00 }, rotation = { 0, 180, 180 }, GUID = 'c8919e' },
        ['Act1'] = { position = { 17.50, 3.54, -6.02 }, rotation = { 0, 90, 0 }, GUID = 'c9c935' },
        ['Act2'] = { position = { 17.50, 2.54, -6.02 }, rotation = { 0, 90, 0 }, GUID = '76d937' },
        ['Act3'] = { position = { 17.50, 1.54, -6.02 }, rotation = { 0, 90, 0 }, GUID = '6063e2' },
    },
    welcome = {
        ['Diamond'] = { position = { 4.00, 1.52, 0.50 }, rotation = { 0, 180, 0 }, GUID = 'b8226e' },
        ['Circle'] = { position = { -2.00, 1.52, 9.00 }, rotation = { 0, 180, 0 }, GUID = '8f833c' },
        ['Tee'] = { position = { 10.00, 1.52, 9.00 }, rotation = { 0, 180, 0 }, GUID = '538a1f' },
        ['Encounter'] = { position = { 30.50, 3.61, -3.00 }, rotation = { 0, 180, 180 }, GUID = '4b5941' },
        ['Act1'] = { position = { 17.50, 3.54, -6.02 }, rotation = { 0, 90, 0 }, GUID = 'f819a6' },
        ['Act2'] = { position = { 17.50, 2.54, -6.02 }, rotation = { 0, 90, 0 }, GUID = '76d937' },
        ['Act3'] = { position = { 17.50, 1.54, -6.02 }, rotation = { 0, 90, 0 }, GUID = '6063e2' }
    },
}

local sanctuary = {
    ['Star'] = { position = { { 17.00, 1.52, 25.00 }, { 19.00, 1.52, 18.00 }, { 17.50, 1.52, 11.50 }, { 10.00, 1.52, 26.50 } }, GUID = {}, rotation = { { 0.00, 180.00, 0 }, { 0.00, 180.00, 0.00 }, { 0.00, 180.00, 0.00 }, { 0.00, 180.00, 0.00 } } },
}



local outOfPlayPile = {
    ['encounterDeck'] = {
        position = { 30.50, 3.61, -3.00 } },
    ['victory'] = {
        position = { 30.50, 1.51, 2.50 } }
}



function onLoad()
    createButton()
    math.randomseed(os.time())
    self.randomize()
    self.shuffle()
    completeAllLocationsTable()
end

function createButton()
    self.createButton({
        label = "Mise en place",
        click_function = "question1",
        function_owner = self,
        position = { 0, 0.3, 1.8 },
        rotation = { 0, 0, 0 },
        height = 350,
        width = 1800,
        font_size = 250,
        color = { 0, 0, 0 },
        font_color = { 1, 1, 1 },
        tooltip = "Mise en place"
    })
end

function question1()
    broadcastToAll("Les investigateurs sont-il membres de la loge ? ", 'Yellow')
    self.removeButton(0)
    self.createButton({
        label = "Oui",
        click_function = "yes1",
        function_owner = self,
        position = { -1, 0.3, 1.8 },
        rotation = { 0, 0, 0 },
        height = 400,
        width = 800,
        font_size = 250,
        color = { 0, 0, 0 },
        font_color = { 1, 1, 1 },
    })
    self.createButton({
        label = "Non",
        click_function = "no1",
        function_owner = self,
        position = { 1, 0.3, 1.8 },
        rotation = { 0, 0, 0 },
        height = 400,
        width = 800,
        font_size = 250,
        color = { 0, 0, 0 },
        font_color = { 1, 1, 1 },
    })
end

function yes1()
    versions = versions['welcome']
    setUp()
end

function no1()
    versions = versions['infilter']
    setUp()
end

function setUp()
    for icon, card in pairs(location) do
        placeObj(card)
    end

    for k, card in pairs(versions) do
        placeObj(card)
    end
    Wait.time(function()
        local encounterDeck = getOutOfPlayPile('encounterDeck')
        encounterDeck.shuffle()
        broadcastToAll('Mise en place terminée', { 0, 0.75, 0.75 })
    end, 3)
    self.removeButton(1)
    self.editButton({
        position = { 0, 0.3, 2.2 },
        index = 0,
        label = "Portes du\nSanctuaire",
        click_function = "sanctuaryDoors",
        height = 550,
        width = 1100,
        font_size = 200,
    }

    )
end

function sanctuaryDoors()
    for i = 1, 4 do
        placeObj({
            GUID = sanctuary['Star'].GUID[i],
            position = sanctuary['Star'].position[i],
            rotation = sanctuary['Star'].rotation[i]
        })
    end
    self.clearButtons()
end

---comment
---@param icon any string matching with an icon name
---@param number any number of card that must be chosen

function chooseAmongstInAtable(tab, number)
    local row = {}
    for i = 1, number do
        local j = math.random(1, #tab)
        local k = math.random(1, #row + 1)
        table.insert(row, k, tab[j])
        table.remove(tab, j)
    end
    return row
end

function getOutOfPlayPile(pile)
    local position = {
        x = outOfPlayPile[pile].position[1],
        y = outOfPlayPile[pile].position[2] - 2,
        z = outOfPlayPile[pile].position[3]
    }
    local hitList = Physics.cast({
        origin       = position,
        direction    = { 0, 1, 0 },
        type         = 3,
        size         = { 3, 3, 3 },
        max_distance = 0,
        debug        = false,
    })

    for _, object in ipairs(hitList) do
        local obj = object.hit_object
        if obj.type == "Deck" then
            return obj
        end
    end
end

function completeAllLocationsTable()
    local containedObjects = self.getData().ContainedObjects
    for k, obj in pairs(containedObjects) do
        if obj.Name == 'Card' then
            local metadata = Global.call('getMetadata', obj)
            if metadata then
                if
                    metadata.locationFront ~= nil then
                    local icon = metadata.locationFront.icons
                    if metadata.locationFront.icons == 'Star' then
                        table.insert(sanctuary[icon].GUID, obj.GUID)
                    elseif metadata.locationFront.icons == 'Crescent' then
                        location[icon].GUID = obj.GUID
                    end
                end
            end
        end
    end
end

function hasValue(tab, val)
    for i, v in ipairs(tab) do
        if v == val then return i end
    end
    return false
end

function placeObj(obj)
    local pickedUpCard = self.takeObject({
        guid = obj.GUID,
        rotation = obj.rotation
    })
    pickedUpCard.setPositionSmooth(obj.position, false, false)
    return pickedUpCard
end

ContainedObjects.LuaScript:
-- Utility memory bag by Directsun
-- Version 2.7.0
-- Fork of Memory Bag 2.0 by MrStump
--
-- Want to contribute? Create an issue or fork the code on GitHub and submit a pull request:
-- https://github.com/sunflowermans/TTS-UtilityMemoryBag


function updateSave()
    local data_to_save = {["ml"]=memoryList}
    saved_data = JSON.encode(data_to_save)
    self.script_state = saved_data
end

function combineMemoryFromBagsWithin()
    local bagObjList = self.getObjects()
    for _, bagObj in ipairs(bagObjList) do
        local data = bagObj.lua_script_state
        if data ~= nil then
            local j = JSON.decode(data)
            if j ~= nil and j.ml ~= nil then
                for guid, entry in pairs(j.ml) do
                    memoryList[guid] = entry
                end
            end
        end
    end
end

function updateMemoryWithMoves()
    memoryList = memoryListBackup
    --get the first transposed object's coordinates
    local obj = getObjectFromGUID(moveGuid)

    -- p1 is where needs to go, p2 is where it was
    local refObjPos = memoryList[moveGuid].pos
    local deltaPos = findOffsetDistance(obj.getPosition(), refObjPos, nil)
    local movedRotation = obj.getRotation()
    for guid, entry in pairs(memoryList) do
        memoryList[guid].pos.x = entry.pos.x - deltaPos.x
        memoryList[guid].pos.y = entry.pos.y - deltaPos.y
        memoryList[guid].pos.z = entry.pos.z - deltaPos.z
        -- memoryList[guid].rot.x = movedRotation.x
        -- memoryList[guid].rot.y = movedRotation.y
        -- memoryList[guid].rot.z = movedRotation.z
    end

    --theList[obj.getGUID()] = {

function onload(saved_data)

    fresh = true
    if saved_data ~= "" then
        local loaded_data = JSON.decode(saved_data)
        --Set up information off of loaded_data
        memoryList = loaded_data.ml
    else
        --Set up information for if there is no saved saved data
        memoryList = {}

    end

    moveList = {}
    moveGuid = nil

    if next(memoryList) == nil then
        createSetupButton()
    else
        fresh = false
        createMemoryActionButtons()
    end
end


--Beginning Setup


--Make setup button
 function createSetupButton()
    self.createButton({
      label="Config", click_function="buttonClick_setup", function_owner=self,
      position={0,0.1,-2.1}, rotation={0,0,0}, height=275, width=625,
      font_size=150, color={0,0,0}, font_color={1,1,1}
    })
 end

--Triggered by Transpose button
function buttonClick_transpose()
    moveGuid = nil
    broadcastToAll("Select one object and move it- all objects will move relative to the new location", {0.75, 0.75, 1})
    memoryListBackup = duplicateTable(memoryList)
    memoryList = {}
    moveList = {}
    self.clearButtons()
    self.clearInputs()
    createButtonsOnAllObjects(true)
    createSetupActionButtons(true)
end

--Triggered by setup button,
function buttonClick_setup()
    memoryListBackup = duplicateTable(memoryList)
    memoryList = {}
    self.clearButtons()
    self.clearInputs()
    createButtonsOnAllObjects(false)
    createSetupActionButtons(false)
end

function getAllObjectsInMemory()
    local objTable = {}
    local curObj = {}

    for guid in pairs(memoryListBackup) do
        curObj = getObjectFromGUID(guid)
        table.insert(objTable, curObj)
    end

    return objTable
    -- return getAllObjects()
end

--Creates selection buttons on objects
function createButtonsOnAllObjects(move)
    buttonIndexMap = {}
    local howManyButtons = 0

    local objsToHaveButtons = {}
    if move == true then
        objsToHaveButtons = getAllObjectsInMemory()
    else
        objsToHaveButtons = getAllObjects()
    end

    for _, obj in ipairs(objsToHaveButtons) do
        if obj ~= self then
            --On a normal bag, the button positions aren't the same size as the bag.
            globalScaleFactor = 1* 1/self.getScale().x
            --Super sweet math to set button positions
            local selfPos = self.getPosition()
            local objPos = obj.getPosition()
            local deltaPos = findOffsetDistance(selfPos, objPos, obj)
            local objPos = rotateLocalCoordinates(deltaPos, self)
            objPos.x = -objPos.x * globalScaleFactor
            objPos.y = objPos.y * globalScaleFactor + 2
            objPos.z = objPos.z * globalScaleFactor * 0.9
            --Workaround for custom PDFs
            if obj.Book then
                objPos.y = objPos.y + 0.5
            end
            --Offset rotation of bag
            local rot = self.getRotation()
            rot.y = -rot.y + 180
            --Create function
            local funcName = "selectButton_" .. howManyButtons
            local func = function() buttonClick_selection(obj, move) end
            local color = {0.75,0.25,0.25,0.6}
            local colorMove = {0,0,1,0.6}
            if move == true then
                color = colorMove
            end
            self.setVar(funcName, func)
            self.createButton({
                click_function=funcName, function_owner=self,
                position=objPos, rotation=rot, height=500, width=500,
                color=color,
            })
            buttonIndexMap[obj.getGUID()] = howManyButtons
            howManyButtons = howManyButtons + 1
        end
    end
end

--Creates submit and cancel buttons
function createSetupActionButtons(move)
    self.createButton({
        label="Annuler", click_function="buttonClick_cancel", function_owner=self,
      position={-0.7,0.1,2.1}, rotation={0,0,0}, height=275, width=625,

    self.createButton({
        label="Valider", click_function="buttonClick_submit", function_owner=self,
        position={-0.7,0.3,2.6}, rotation={0,0,0}, height=275, width=625,
        font_size=140, color={0,0,0}, font_color={1,1,1}
    })

    if move == false then

          position={0.7,0.3,2.1}, rotation={0,0,0}, height=275, width=625,

        self.createButton({

--During Setup


--Checks or unchecks buttons
function buttonClick_selection(obj, move)
    local index = buttonIndexMap[obj.getGUID()]
    local colorMove = {0,0,1,0.6}
    local color = {0,1,0,0.6}

    previousGuid = selectedGuid
    selectedGuid = obj.getGUID()

    theList = memoryList
    if move == true then
        theList = moveList
        if previousGuid ~= nil and previousGuid ~= selectedGuid then
            local prevObj = getObjectFromGUID(previousGuid)
            prevObj.highlightOff()
            self.editButton({index=previousIndex, color=colorMove})
            theList[previousGuid] = nil
        end
        previousIndex = index
    end

    if theList[selectedGuid] == nil then
        self.editButton({index=index, color=color})
        --Adding pos/rot to memory table
        local pos, rot = obj.getPosition(), obj.getRotation()
        --I need to add it like this or it won't save due to indexing issue
        theList[obj.getGUID()] = {
            pos={x=round(pos.x,4), y=round(pos.y,4), z=round(pos.z,4)},
            rot={x=round(rot.x,4), y=round(rot.y,4), z=round(rot.z,4)},
            lock=obj.getLock(),
            tint=obj.getColorTint()
        }
        obj.highlightOn({0,1,0})
    else
        color = {0.75,0.25,0.25,0.6}
        if move == true then
            color = colorMove
        end
        self.editButton({index=index, color=color})
        theList[obj.getGUID()] = nil
        obj.highlightOff()
    end
end

function editDragSelection(bagObj, player, remove)
    local selectedObjs = Player[player].getSelectedObjects()
    if not remove then
        for _, obj in ipairs(selectedObjs) do
            local index = buttonIndexMap[obj.getGUID()]
            --Ignore if already in the memory list, or does not have a button
            if index and not memoryList[obj.getGUID()] then
                self.editButton({index=index, color={0,1,0,0.6}})
                --Adding pos/rot to memory table
                local pos, rot = obj.getPosition(), obj.getRotation()
                --I need to add it like this or it won't save due to indexing issue
                memoryList[obj.getGUID()] = {
                    pos={x=round(pos.x,4), y=round(pos.y,4), z=round(pos.z,4)},
                    rot={x=round(rot.x,4), y=round(rot.y,4), z=round(rot.z,4)},
                    lock=obj.getLock(),
                    tint=obj.getColorTint()
                }
                obj.highlightOn({0,1,0})
            end
        end
    else
        for _, obj in ipairs(selectedObjs) do
            local index = buttonIndexMap[obj.getGUID()]
            if index and memoryList[obj.getGUID()] then
                color = {0.75,0.25,0.25,0.6}
                self.editButton({index=index, color=color})
                memoryList[obj.getGUID()] = nil
                obj.highlightOff()
            end
        end
    end
end

--Cancels selection process
function buttonClick_cancel()
    memoryList = memoryListBackup
    moveList = {}
    self.clearButtons()
    self.clearInputs()
    if next(memoryList) == nil then
        createSetupButton()
    else
        createMemoryActionButtons()
    end
    removeAllHighlights()
    broadcastToAll("Sélection annulée", {1,1,1})
    moveGuid = nil
end

--Saves selections
function buttonClick_submit()
    fresh = false
    if next(moveList) ~= nil then
        for guid in pairs(moveList) do
            moveGuid = guid
        end
        if memoryListBackup[moveGuid] == nil then
            broadcastToAll("Item selected for moving is not already in memory", {1, 0.25, 0.25})
        else
            broadcastToAll("Moving all items in memory relative to new objects position!", {0.75, 0.75, 1})
            self.clearButtons()
            self.clearInputs()
            createMemoryActionButtons()
            local count = 0
            for guid in pairs(moveList) do
                moveGuid = guid
                count = count + 1
                local obj = getObjectFromGUID(guid)
                if obj ~= nil then obj.highlightOff() end
            end
            updateMemoryWithMoves()
            updateSave()
            buttonClick_place()
        end
    elseif next(memoryList) == nil and moveGuid == nil then
        memoryList = memoryListBackup
        broadcastToAll("No selections made.", {0.75, 0.25, 0.25})
    end
    combineMemoryFromBagsWithin()
    self.clearButtons()
    self.clearInputs()
    createMemoryActionButtons()
    local count = 0
    for guid in pairs(memoryList) do
        count = count + 1
        local obj = getObjectFromGUID(guid)
        if obj ~= nil then obj.highlightOff() end
    end
    broadcastToAll(count.." Objects Saved", {1,1,1})
    updateSave()
    moveGuid = nil
end

function combineTables(first_table, second_table)
    for k,v in pairs(second_table) do first_table[k] = v end
end

function buttonClick_add()
    fresh = false
    combineTables(memoryList, memoryListBackup)
    broadcastToAll("Adding internal bags and selections to existing memory", {0.25, 0.75, 0.25})
    combineMemoryFromBagsWithin()
    self.clearButtons()
    self.clearInputs()
    createMemoryActionButtons()
    local count = 0
    for guid in pairs(memoryList) do
        count = count + 1
        local obj = getObjectFromGUID(guid)
        if obj ~= nil then obj.highlightOff() end
    end
    broadcastToAll(count.." Objects Saved", {1,1,1})
    updateSave()
end

function buttonClick_remove()
    broadcastToAll("Removing Selected Entries From Memory", {1.0, 0.25, 0.25})
    self.clearButtons()
    self.clearInputs()
    createMemoryActionButtons()
    local count = 0
    for guid in pairs(memoryList) do
        count = count + 1
        memoryListBackup[guid] = nil
        local obj = getObjectFromGUID(guid)
        if obj ~= nil then obj.highlightOff() end
    end
    broadcastToAll(count.." Objects Removed", {1,1,1})
    memoryList = memoryListBackup
    updateSave()
end

function buttonClick_setNew()
    broadcastToAll("Setting new position relative to items in memory", {0.75, 0.75, 1})
    self.clearButtons()
    self.clearInputs()
    createMemoryActionButtons()
    local count = 0
    for _, obj in ipairs(getAllObjects()) do
        guid = obj.guid
        if memoryListBackup[guid] ~= nil then
            count = count + 1
            memoryListBackup[guid].pos = obj.getPosition()
            memoryListBackup[guid].rot = obj.getRotation()
            memoryListBackup[guid].lock = obj.getLock()
            memoryListBackup[guid].tint = obj.getColorTint()
        end
    end
    broadcastToAll(count.." Objects Saved", {1,1,1})
    memoryList = memoryListBackup
    updateSave()
end

--Sends objects from bag/table to their saved position/rotation
function buttonClick_place()
    local bagObjList = self.getObjects()
    for guid, entry in pairs(memoryList) do
        local obj = getObjectFromGUID(guid)
        --If obj is out on the table, move it to the saved pos/rot
        if obj ~= nil then
            obj.setPositionSmooth(entry.pos)
            obj.setRotationSmooth(entry.rot)
            obj.setLock(entry.lock)
            obj.setColorTint(entry.tint)
        else
            --If obj is inside of the bag
            for _, bagObj in ipairs(bagObjList) do
                if bagObj.guid == guid then
                    local item = self.takeObject({
                        guid=guid, position=entry.pos, rotation=entry.rot, smooth=false
                    })
                    item.setLock(entry.lock)
                    item.setColorTint(entry.tint)
                    break
                end
            end
        end
    end
    broadcastToAll("Objets placés", {1,1,1})
end

--Recalls objects to bag from table
function buttonClick_recall()
    for guid, entry in pairs(memoryList) do
        local obj = getObjectFromGUID(guid)
        if obj ~= nil then self.putObject(obj) end
    end
    broadcastToAll("Objets rangés", {1,1,1})
end


--Utility functions


--Find delta (difference) between 2 x/y/z coordinates
function findOffsetDistance(p1, p2, obj)
    local yOffset = 0
    if obj ~= nil then
        local bounds = obj.getBounds()
        yOffset = (bounds.size.y - bounds.offset.y)
    end
    local deltaPos = {}
    deltaPos.x = (p2.x-p1.x)
    deltaPos.y = (p2.y-p1.y) + yOffset
    deltaPos.z = (p2.z-p1.z)
    return deltaPos
end

--Used to rotate a set of coordinates by an angle
function rotateLocalCoordinates(desiredPos, obj)
    local objPos, objRot = obj.getPosition(), obj.getRotation()
    local angle = math.rad(objRot.y)
    local x = desiredPos.x * math.cos(angle) - desiredPos.z * math.sin(angle)
    local z = desiredPos.x * math.sin(angle) + desiredPos.z * math.cos(angle)
    --return {x=objPos.x+x, y=objPos.y+desiredPos.y, z=objPos.z+z}
    return {x=x, y=desiredPos.y, z=z}
end

function rotateMyCoordinates(desiredPos, obj)
    local angle = math.rad(obj.getRotation().y)
    local x = desiredPos.x * math.sin(angle)
    local z = desiredPos.z * math.cos(angle)
    return {x=x, y=desiredPos.y, z=z}
end

--Coroutine delay, in seconds
function wait(time)
    local start = os.time()
    repeat coroutine.yield(0) until os.time() > start + time
end

--Duplicates a table (needed to prevent it making reference to the same objects)
function duplicateTable(oldTable)
    local newTable = {}
    for k, v in pairs(oldTable) do
        newTable[k] = v
    end
    return newTable
end

--Moves scripted highlight from all objects
function removeAllHighlights()
    for _, obj in ipairs(getAllObjects()) do
        obj.highlightOff()
    end
end

--Round number (num) to the Nth decimal (dec)
function round(num, dec)
    local mult = 10^(dec or 0)
    return math.floor(num * mult + 0.5) / mult
end


--[[
This object provides access to a variable stored on the "Global script".
The variable holds the GUIDs for every Utility Memory Bag in the scene.
Example:
{'805ebd', '35cc21', 'fc8886', 'f50264', '5f5f63'}
--]]
AllMemoryBagsInScene = {
    NAME_OF_GLOBAL_VARIABLE = "_UtilityMemoryBag_AllMemoryBagsInScene"
}

function AllMemoryBagsInScene:add(guid)
    local guids = Global.getTable(self.NAME_OF_GLOBAL_VARIABLE) or {}
    table.insert(guids, guid)
    Global.setTable(self.NAME_OF_GLOBAL_VARIABLE, guids)
end

function AllMemoryBagsInScene:getGuidList()
    return Global.getTable(self.NAME_OF_GLOBAL_VARIABLE) or {}
end
